alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:37PM EDT until May 27 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON...SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE... SOUTHWESTERN SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 1237 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Claresville, or 8 miles west of Boykins, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Boykins around 1240 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Adams Grove, Gray, Grizzard, Handsom, Bryants Corner, Worrell, Pleasant Hill, Mason, Severn and Margarettsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina... and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
